meanings.definition: The runic alphabet used by Germanic peoples.
meanings.sent1: The ancient futharks were symbols used for writing.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study the futharks to understand ancient texts.
meanings.sent3: I tried to write my name using the futharks, but it looked like gibberish.
meanings.sent4: The futharks carved on the stone seemed to whisper secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: The intricate futharks on the artifact fascinated the archaeologists.

meanings.definition: A system of writing using characters derived from the runic alphabet.
meanings.sent1: The futharks were used to communicate important messages.
meanings.sent2: In ancient times, people would carve messages using the futharks.
meanings.sent3: The children created a secret code using the futharks to pass notes in class.
meanings.sent4: His handwriting was so messy, it looked like a jumble of futharks.
meanings.sent5: The futharks on the scroll glowed mysteriously under the moonlight.
